message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer ensures we both benefit from this deal.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation rate is higher for me.
Bob, let's be realistic. This offer still gives you a good share considering the inflation. It's better to take a decent deal now than risk losing more in the next round.
Considering the growing difference in our inflation rates, I believe I should get a bigger share to make up for the loss in value.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a straight 50/50 split. Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains even further.
